# phdhelpr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
<!-- badges: end -->

phdhelpr is a simple package based repository for helper functions used in my thesis

### Installation

You can install the development version of phdhelpr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("brgordon17/phdhelpr")
```
